biotools.summary: Modular pipeline for comprehensive analysis of small RNA-Seq data, comprising specific tools for adapter trimming, quality filtering, differential expression analysis, biological target prediction and other useful options by integrating multiple open source modules and resources in an automated workflow.

bioschemas.name: iMir
bioschemas.summary: Modular pipeline for comprehensive analysis of small RNA-Seq data, comprising specific tools for adapter trimming, quality filtering, differential expression analysis, biological target prediction and other useful options by integrating multiple open source modules and resources in an automated workflow.
